Name: Bird Boxing
About the game: Welcome to Bird Boxing, the world's highest-stakes competition Fly, zoom around and punch each other in the skies Try our original movement system to control your bird between the ropes. Adjust your trajectory, open your wings to drift, change direction and dash, and punch other players with jabs, one-two combos, or charge powerful straight punches. Cooperate and compete alone or with friends Includes both multiplayer and singleplayer modes. Get to know the varied Bird Boxing Championship contenders Birds from all around the world have come to compete and become the Bird Boxing Champion. Each bird has its own different playstyles, find your favorite!
